column4: hello. I have a wireless card installed as eth0, and when I do i get eth0 connected to my private network. but I don't get any IP adress. and when I do "iwlist scan" I get: eth0     Interface doesn't support scanning: Operation not sipported .. what can be wrong?
some wireless cards are a little obnoxious. Check the Ubuntu Wiki to see if yours is mentioned by name.
there's a section on wireless cards, specifically.
